description:
Providing focused business and commercial, land development, and government relation services, the law firm of Conrad & Scherer, L.L.P., in New York, New York, strives to help clients ensure their operations and companies run smoothly. We also have law firm locations in Fort Lauderdale, Florida; Brevard, North Carolina; and Quito, Ecuador, allowing us to serve clients locally, nationally and internationally.

Combining focused legal counsel with experienced business acumen, our law firm represents clients in a wide range of complex matters. These include the following: transactional law; contracts; employment law; mergers and acquisitions; securities; commercial fraud and forensic recovery; financial regulatory litigation; bankruptcy and creditor's rights; intellectual property; patents; copyright and trademark litigation; construction law; land use and zoning litigation; natural resources; environmental law; cross-border litigation; international negotiation; international real estate; and procurement and government contracts; third-party insurance defense; property coverage and insurance bad faith; health care law; insurance coverage litigation; professional liability and negligence; malpractice securities and general liability coverage.

In addition to business and commercial law, our law firm provides dedicated class action and appellate class action, personal injury and wrongful death, product liability, medical malpractice, employment disputes, general civil litigation, international family law, and maritime and admiralty representation. We also aid people with estate planning, including establishing wills and trusts, and represent clients in trust and probate litigation cases.

Our team at the law firm of Conrad & Scherer, L.L.P., works to help our clients develop solutions and take actions to prevent disputes before they come up. In cases when litigation is unavoidable, however, we vigorously advocate on behalf of our clients' rights and best interests. To best serve those we represent, our law firm accepts credit cards.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
